name: Streadata.io API Gallery - OrgHunter
description: This is a repository of orghunter APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: OrgHunter
apis.description: OrgHunter.com is the number one destination for online charity and donor matching services. Every charity deserves the opportunity to be discovered regardless of size or financial status.
